page.title: 08RELIGION :- Roxby
page.content:
{ St Mary's Church Roxby Services:- 9.30am each Sunday except 1st and 5th of each month. On the 1st there is a united service at the Methodist Church and on the 5th a service for all the Winterton group churches at All Saints Winterton. Average attendance :- 20
{ Methodist Church Roxby} Services:- 11am each Sunday except on 3rd Sunday when there is a united service in the church. Average attendance :-8 Also a Sunday School at 11am for the 11 children which attend. The Sunday school has a Christmas party and an annual picnic in Central Park, Scunthorpe.
